Package controller

Class CustomerFormController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.CustomerFormController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class CustomerFormController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    The customer form controller that displays all the editable fields a blank, new customer or an already-filled-out, existing customer. Validates all data given by user and refuses to save if data is not valid.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      private static class  CustomerFormController.CustomerOperation
      Represents the creation of a new customer or the editing of an existing customer.
      private static class  CustomerFormController.FieldBlankException
      The exception that is thrown if one or more fields are blank when trying to save the customer.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addNewCustomer()
      Invoked by the MainController when the "Add" button is clicked, and sets the fields & labels accordingly.
      private void applyFieldsToCustomer()
      Takes all the user-input values in the form fields and sets the appropriate attributes in the customer model.
      private void checkFields()
      Checks the user input and verifies that no fields are blank.
      private void createCustomer()
      Applies the fields to a new customer model and saves to the database.

      Invoked by the MainController when the "Modify" button is clicked, and sets the fields & labels + currentCustomerOperation accordingly.

      Initializes the CustomerFormController.
      void onCancel()
      Invoked when the escape key is hit or the "Cancel" button is pressed, and closes the modal and doesn't make any changes if the action is confirmed by the user.
      void onCountrySelected()
      Invoked when a country (U.K., Candaa, or U.S.) is selected from the countryNameChoiceBox.
      void onSave()
      Invoked when the "Save" button is pressed, and closes the modal after saving the customer after validating the user input.
      private boolean showConfirmationAlert​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String content)
      A generic helper method that shows a confirmation alert given the title and content, returning true if the user confirmed the action, and false otherwise.
      private void showErrorAlert​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String content)
      A generic helper method that shows an error alert given the title and content.
      private void updateCustomer()
      Applies the fields to the customer model and saves changes to the database.

      • editExistingCustomer

        public void editExistingCustomer​(Customer existingCustomer)
        Invoked by the MainController when the "Modify" button is clicked, and sets the fields & labels + currentCustomerOperation accordingly.

      • showErrorAlert

        private void showErrorAlert​(java.lang.String title,
                            java.lang.String content)
        A generic helper method that shows an error alert given the title and content.
        Parameters:
        title - the text that is displayed on the alert window's title and in the header section
        content - the text that is displayed in the body of the alert

      • showConfirmationAlert

        private boolean showConfirmationAlert​(java.lang.String title,
                                      java.lang.String content)
        A generic helper method that shows a confirmation alert given the title and content, returning true if the user confirmed the action, and false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        title - the text that is displayed on the alert window's title and in the header section
        content - the text that is displayed in the body of the alert
        Returns:
        whether the user confirmed the action

      • onCountrySelected

        public void onCountrySelected()
        Invoked when a country (U.K., Candaa, or U.S.) is selected from the countryNameChoiceBox. It re-enables the divisionNameChoiceBox and populates it with the divisions for the selected country.

      • onCancel

        public void onCancel()
        Invoked when the escape key is hit or the "Cancel" button is pressed, and closes the modal and doesn't make any changes if the action is confirmed by the user.
        See Also:
        showConfirmationAlert(String, String)

      • onSave

        public void onSave()
        Invoked when the "Save" button is pressed, and closes the modal after saving the customer after validating the user input.
        See Also:
        checkFields(), updateCustomer(), createCustomer(), MainController.updateCustomer(Customer), MainController.addCustomer(Customer), showErrorAlert(String, String)

      • createCustomer

        private void createCustomer()
        Applies the fields to a new customer model and saves to the database.
        The lambda allows us to use 1 line of code to assign the returned Optional<Customer> if it is present. This saves 2 lines of code.
        See Also:
        applyFieldsToCustomer(), DBCustomer

      • updateCustomer

        private void updateCustomer()
        Applies the fields to the customer model and saves changes to the database.
        The lambda allows us to use 1 line of code to assign the returned Optional<Customer> if it is present. This saves 2 lines of code.
        See Also:
        applyFieldsToCustomer(), DBCustomer

      • applyFieldsToCustomer

        private void applyFieldsToCustomer()
        Takes all the user-input values in the form fields and sets the appropriate attributes in the customer model.
        See Also:
        customer

      • checkFields

        private void checkFields()
                  throws CustomerFormController.FieldBlankException
        Checks the user input and verifies that no fields are blank.
        Throws:
        CustomerFormController.FieldBlankException - If any field is blank.
